data.name: From Research to Reality Seminar
data.description:
Join Us for our Research to Reality Seminar 👩‍🔬 COME IN PERSON OR SCAN QR CODE TO ATTEND VIRTUALLY! Top brands will be joining us for an insightful night! 🧠

Without a doubt the future of the automotive industry is Electric. ⚡️ But how? How is humanity planning on changing the centuries old practice of using oil to fully electric in just a couple of years? 🤔

At the University of Warwick's first From Research to Reality event headlined by BMW, we will be taking a journey through the future of the electric mobility industry. 🚙

From careers in the automotive engineering industries, to sneak peaks into innovations that are being developed concurrently by various innovative firms that will change the Automotive field forever. Don't miss out on the Automotive Engineering event of the year! ‼️

This event is worth 3 PDR points so make sure you come along! PDR points are only awarded to in-person attendees so make sure we see you there! 🪙
